name: The Monday Night Comedy Show (Weekly)
venue: Club Underground at the Spring Street Tavern - NE Minneapolis
notes: Audience admission $5. Booked showcase. Must attend one show prior to booking. Everyone gets on at least once. Message Andy on FB for a spot or talk to him after the show, do not contact club. There is a wild card slot for 5 minutes in the 2nd act. If chosen, you get your $4 back plus a drink ticket.

name: Gutty's Comedy Club (Weekly)
venue: Gutty's Comedy Club - Southdale Center, Edina,MN
notes: Clean open mic. Sign up online at Open mic sign up

name: Laugh Smile Comedy Open Mic
notes: If you wanna perform music bring a flash drive. Call 6126366554 to get in the door.

name: Uproar Open Mic
notes:
As of March 2022 Uproar Open Mic is now at Bryant Lake Bowl. Comedy open mic for women, trans, non-binary, black, brown, indigenous, gay, lesbian, bisexual and pansexual folk and/or for any of these identities. Will not ask questions about how you identify, (other than your pronouns for the sake of announcing you on stage referring to you when your name doesn't work for something) but you're pretty much admitting you are one of those identities by doing the mic. Sign up in person at 6:00pm. Show starts 7:00pm. You can also sign up in advance via email: vector9varietyshow@gmail.com - (this email is used for sign ups for more than one mic so please specify which one you're referring to in the email header.)
  • Uproar on Facebook.
  • Uproar on Instagram.

name: Monday's at Moose
notes: Free show. Sign up at 7:30. Show at 9.

name: Camp Bar Open Mic Night (Weekly except for 1st Monday of the month)
address: 490 Robert St. N., St. Paul, MN 55191
notes: Notes: Sign-up starts around 9:15pm and the performances begin around 9:30pm. People who click "going" on the weekly event invite get first sign-ups, IF they are present when the list opens. Each performer gets 7 minutes. Performances can be recorded and will be put up on the AQObserver YouTube channel. MC is Robert Cudinski, former host of the Artist's Quarter open mic."Poets, Musicians, Comics, Magicians, Fools and Sages welcome."

name: Triple Threat Tuesdays (Weekly)
venue: Rick Bronson's House of Comedy at the Mall Of America
notes: Pre-booked showcase, with three wildcard spots given out each week for people who didn't sign up ahead of time (see info on how to sign up for wildcards below). There is typically a 2-6 week waiting list for regular showcase spots depending on how many people have signed up ahead of time. Comics get five minutes of time. Email Mike Brody at brody@houseofcomedy.net for spot. Tickets are $5, along with $5 appetizers and select $5 drinks. (There is a service fee with tickets that makes it actually come to $10, but if you get someone on your guest list they get in for free.) WILDCARD SPOTS: If you get to the HoC before 7:15 I will put your name on a list and draw three names. Those three people will get the 1st, 2nd and 3rd spot respectively, after the MC.

name: Acme Comedy Company ( Weekly)
notes: Notes: 6-7pm sign-up. Put a star by your name if it is your first time up. List comes out at 7:30pm.

name: VFW Comedy Night (3rd Tuesday of every month)
notes: Pre-booked. Sign up with Hessley on Facebook.

name: Stand-Up Saloon ( 1st and 3rd Tuesday of the month)
notes: Hosted by Denzel Belin, Betty Bang and Shyloh Blake. Show is every 1st and 3rd Tuesday of the month. There will be 2 pre-booked feature spots (7-10 minutes) plus a comedy drag number each show. Sign up in person starts at 7:30, list will go up up about 8:15 and show starts at 8:30. Comics will get 3 minutes. Comics interested in a feature spot can email me at standupsaloon@gmail.com

name: Orale Comedy Open Mic
notes: Sign up 7:15 to 7:45. Mic will be 8:00 to 10:00 p.m. Technically the owner just wants to try it out for a couple weeks before committing, but I'm confident there's no reason she should want to end it. That being said, I definitely have stage time June 1st and June 8th. If you are a pro, reach out to me about getting a spot in advance, but for the most part I'd like sign up to take place in person.

name: Comedy At The Crane (Weekly)
notes: Sign up 7-7:45pm. You can also call Seth at 612-209-6641. Each comic gets three minutes of time. Recording is available.  Check us out at instagram.com/comedyatthecrane and facebook.com/comedyatthecrane.

name: The Comedy Cave At Keg & Case Market (Weekly)
notes: Sign up anytime on Wednesdays at http://ethanyeshaya.com/comedycave. Or message Ethan on Instagram. Listed posted at 5pm on this page http://ethanyeshaya.com/list.

name: Open-Mic Comedy @ The Terminal Bar
notes: Sign up starts at 4:45pm

name: Sisyphus Brewing Open Mic (Weekly)
notes: Open mic sign up from 6:00-7:00pm with the list posted at 7:15. First time trying stand-up at Sisyphus? Put a ⭐ by your name to guarantee stage time.

name: Yes I Can Can! ( Every Thursday)
address: 755 Prior Ave N Suite #004, St Paul, MN 55104
notes: Sign up starts at 7:15pm. Sign up get up, show starts at 8:00pm. One weekly headliner (7-10 minutes). Free Entry, Free pizza and 1 free drink for performing comedians. Questions? email Elise at elisecolecomedy@gmail.com

name: Get Up Stand Up Open Mic
notes: Every Friday. Sign up at 6:00, show starts at 6:30pm

name: Friday Open Mic Night (Weekly)
venue: The Comedy Corner Underground (Basement of The Corner Bar)- Minneapolis
notes: Online sign-up (click here) starting noon on Fridays.

name: A Night of Stand Up Comedy (Weekly)
notes: Sign Ups begin at 7:30 and the show kicks off at 8:30 ~ 15 Slots available ~ One FREE drink ticket for each performer and $1 Off Brews ALL NIGHT!!

name: Boundary Open Mic
notes: Starts June 18th, 2022. Every Saturday. Sign up in person at 5:30pm and show starts at 6:00pm.

name: Camp Bar Open Mic (Weekly)
address: 490 Robert St. N., St. Paul, MN 55191
notes: Status during COVID-19 - Open. Sign up starts at 5:30pm. 20 comic cap. 3-5 min each. Ends at 8pm. Email James at openmiclc@gmail.com. Parking is free in St.Paul on Sundays.

name: Blarney's Pub & Grill Open Mic (Weekly)
notes: Sign up at 7:00pm, show starts 7:30pm.
